original_title: Hanggang Dito na Lamang at Maraming Salamat
overview: Fidel is a "closet" gay and Julie is a flaming "queen," but they are bosom buddies. Fidel has been paying for the education of young Efren, but is unable to confess his love for him--until events conspire for him to do so, with painful consequences.
title: Hanggang Dito na Lamang at Maraming Salamat
